links: P. De Geest, Palindromic numbers beyond base 10
prog: (Python)A029736_list, j = [], 0for i in range(10**9):    s = format(j,'x')    if s == s[::-1]:        A029736_list.append(j)    j += 3*i*(i+1)+1 # _Chai Wah Wu_, Dec 20 2015(PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n=0, nn, my(vd = digits(n^3, 16)); if (Vecrev(vd) == vd, print1(n^3, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 21 2015
author: _Patrick De Geest_
